generation_metadata:
```json
{
    "target_object": "a sport car",
    "generation_metadata": "Detailed description of the object and the 16 views for 3D reconstruction, including specific angle descriptions, lighting specifications, material properties, and geometric constraints. MUST address the specific issues from previous feedback: Scoring penalties applied: Improvement suggestions found: -1 point each for scores >7; Quality issues: -2 points image quality. - Ensure a complete 4x4 grid with exactly 16 images, covering all necessary angles. - Maintain consistent lighting across all images to avoid shadows and reflections. - Improve resolution and focus to enhance clarity and detail. CRITICAL: Object details must remain identical across all views. Learning from 4 previous iterations.",
    "image_prompt": "A PERFECT 4x4 grid layout containing exactly sixteen individual digital photographs, arranged in 4 rows and 4 columns, featuring the EXACT SAME sport car captured from 16 DISTINCTLY DIFFERENT 3D angles. Each of the 16 sub-images must be clearly separated and show the IDENTICAL sport car from a UNIQUE 3D viewpoint covering the full 360-degree sphere around the object. The 16 angles must include: front, back, left, right, top, bottom, and 10 additional oblique angles distributed evenly around the 3D space (front-left, front-right, back-left, back-right, top-front, top-back, top-left, top-right, bottom-front, bottom-back, etc.). Each grid position must show a COMPLETELY DIFFERENT 3D angle - no two grids should have similar viewpoints. The object's appearance, details, and characteristics remain COMPLETELY IDENTICAL across all 16 views - only the 3D viewing angle changes. The sport car is centered in each view, with consistent lighting, scale, and positioning. CRITICAL: ONLY the sport car should be visible - NO other objects, items, accessories, or environmental elements. The background must be COMPLETELY PURE WHITE with NO shadows, textures, patterns, or any other elements. The sport car should appear to float in pure white space, suitable for 3D reconstruction. CRITICAL: This MUST be a perfect 4x4 grid with exactly 16 individual sub-images, not a single large image.",
    "description": "This generation consists of a 4x4 grid of 16 images of the same sport car from different angles, designed for 3D reconstruction purposes. Improvements include maintaining object consistency, ensuring lighting uniformity, and achieving a pure white background devoid of shadows or distractions. Each sub-image offers a unique angle, ensuring comprehensive coverage for accurate 3D modeling. This approach addresses previous feedback by focusing on consistent lighting, precise angle distribution, and maintaining a clean, distraction-free background.",

        "all_iterations": 4,
        "latest_scores": {
            "image_quality": 3,
            "metadata_accuracy": 4,
            "completeness": 3
        },
        "latest_suggestions": "Scoring penalties applied: Improvement suggestions found: -1 point each for scores >7; Quality issues: -2 points image quality. - Ensure a complete 4x4 grid with exactly 16 images, covering all necessary angles. - Maintain consistent lighting across all images to avoid shadows and reflections. - Improve resolution and focus to enhance clarity and detail.",
        "latest_metadata_suggestions": "- Specify the requirement for a full 4x4 grid with 16 distinct angles. - Include instructions for consistent lighting and a pure white background. - Emphasize the need for all primary and oblique angles to be captured. Extremely Critical Evaluation Points: - The absence of a proper 4x4 grid is a major flaw, leading to low scores. - Lighting inconsistencies and shadows are significant issues. - Missing angles severely impact the suitability for 3D reconstruction.",
        "historical_analysis": "\n    \ud83e\udde0 INTELLIGENT HISTORICAL CONTEXT:\n    \n    \n    \ud83d\udcca PATTERN ANALYSIS:\n    Score Progression: Iteration 1: 3.7 \u2192 Iteration 2: 2.3 \u2192 Iteration 3: 0.0 \u2192 Iteration 4: 3.3\n    \n    \ud83d\udd0d MOST CRITICAL ISSUES:\n    lighting consistency (3 times), angle diversity (3 times), background issues (3 times)\n    \n    \ud83d\udca1 RECOMMENDED FOCUS:\n    lighting consistency, angle diversity\n    \n    \n    \ud83c\udfaf IMMEDIATE FOCUS (from most recent iteration):\n    - Latest scores: {'image_quality': 3, '
image_prompt: A 4x4 grid of a sport car from different angles

evaluation_results.short_summary:
Image Quality: 5/10
- The images have decent clarity and resolution, but there are visible grid lines and text that distract from the object.
evaluation_results.markdown_report:
Image Quality: 5/10
- The images have decent clarity and resolution, but there are visible grid lines and text that distract from the object. Lighting is inconsistent, with shadows and reflections present.

Metadata Accuracy: 3/10
- The images do not match the metadata requirements. There are only 12 views instead of the required 16, and the presence of text is not appropriate for 3D reconstruction.

Completeness: 2/10
- The grid is incomplete with only 12 images instead of the required 16. Several key angles are missing, and the coverage is inadequate for 3D reconstruction.

Suggestions for Improvement:
- Remove all grid lines and text from the images to focus solely on the car.
- Ensure consistent lighting across all images to avoid shadows and reflections.
- Increase the number of views to 16, ensuring each one is distinct and covers the full 360-degree sphere around the car.
- Include all primary angles (front, back, left, right, top, bottom) and additional oblique angles.

Metadata Suggestions:
- Specify a pure white background with no text or additional elements.
- Clearly define the requirement for a 4x4 grid with 16 distinct views.
- Emphasize the need for consistent lighting and object appearance across all images.

Extremely Critical Evaluation Points:
- The grid is not a proper 4x4, failing the critical grid check.
- Background is not pure white, with visible shadows and reflections.
- Object consistency is compromised by varying lighting and the presence of text.
- Angle diversity is insufficient, with missing views and inadequate coverage.
evaluation_results.suggestions_for_improvement: Scoring penalties applied: Improvement suggestions found: -1 point each for scores >7; Quality issues: -2 points image quality. - Remove all grid lines and text from the images to focus solely on the car. - Ensure consistent lighting across all images to avoid shadows and reflections. - Increase the number of views to 16, ensuring each one is distinct and covers the full 360-degree sphere around the car. - Include all primary angles (front, back, left, right, top, bottom) and additional oblique angles.
